title: GONE: Red Sox T205 (x2) and T206 (x1)
author: Jason Carota

posts.post_title: GONE: Red Sox T205 (x2) and T206 (x1)
posts.post_content:
PayPal preferred, but not necessary.  Email (jason_carota@comcast.net) takes priority over posts.

  * [S]T205 Engle (Polar Bear): $15 shipped[/S]
  * T205 Stahl (Sweet Cap): $15 shipped SOLD
  * T206 Stahl (Glove Shows - Sweet Cap 350 / Fact. 25): $22 shipped SOLD

I'll take both Stahls. Your paypal is not working, however.

Rawn
Both Stahl cards sold.  Thanks Rawn!

Hi,

I';ll buy the Engle at 15.00, send your name/address so I can send yiu a money order.
Any more old REDSOX or BOSTON BRAVES to sell?
REGARDS<
BILL HEDIN
3 Murray Rd
Framingham, MA 01701

Bill,

I should send you a money order for all the great times I've had and the wonderful people I've met at your shows.   Consider the card yours.

Thank you for all you have done for the hobby around these parts.
